existing_features.title: Update the chatroom message input UI (frontend) so that the message text input area uses a 9999px border radius (pill shape).
Reorder the controls in the chatroom message input row so the microphone button and image/media button are positioned to the LEFT of the text input area (Textarea), not to the right.
Set the border radius to 9999px for all buttons in the chatroom message input area: microphone, image/media, and send buttons.
Ensure the height of the text input area matches the height of the send message button in the default (single-line) state.
Limit changes strictly to the specified chatroom message input layout/styling changes; do not modify any other styling, behavior, logic, or UI elsewhere.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update chatroom message input UI: pill-shaped (9999px) text input and buttons, move mic/media buttons to left of input, and match input height to send button (no other changes)

projectName: Chatroom message input: pill radius, left-aligned mic/media buttons, matched heights
